text:
<https://www.uncorkedstudios.com/blog/people-series-charles-holiday-albums/|People Series: Charles' Holiday Albums>
Charles Vestal recorded
<http://www.charlesvestal.com/a-top-secret-christmas/|his first holiday album> in 2004.

He was in a band in college, and realized he had a number of friends who were also in bands. At the time, the group decided to write a few Christmas songs:

“We just kind of decided it would be fun to write Christmas songs because we loved the existing ones and thought there should be more of them.”

attachments.title: People Series: Charles' Holiday Albums
attachments.text: Charles Vestal recorded his first holiday album in 2004. He was in a band in college, and realized he had a number of friends who were also in bands. At the time, the group decided to write a few Christmas songs: “We just kind of decided it would be fun to write Christmas songs because we loved the existing ones and thought there should be more of them.” They wanted to do it as part of the season of giving—to create a gift for people.
